name: Eden Jump
description:
The hero suffered a terrible fate. It's time to climb Eden over the clouds.

How to play?

Tilt your phone to the right or left to control the hero. Avoid thunderclouds!

Platform: Android

Genre: Platform

Mode: Single

Version: 1.1

Author: Anastasiia Smirnova | MK

Adviser: Artem Smirnov | Nekroido

Music: B.G.M - Shooting Sound & RPG BGM Lobby (Unity Asset Store)
